page.title: 05CROY UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: Unemployment is not an unknown thing around Croy.Many people are unemployed and only a few lucky ones have jobs. Some people whom I know are badly wanting jobs.They went to places like Glasgow for factory work,Nottingham for computing and to Devon for farming.One girl longing to get a job had to move away from her family in Croy over to a whole lot of strangers in Paris.She's been there for about 1 year as a nanny.She has made lots of friends she has said in letters to her mother.A man who was brought up in Croy , had to move to Livingston near Edinburgh at the age of 22.He tried to get a job but he did not get one.He went back to Inverness where he married a girl from Balmacara.He then moved to Croy where he finally got a job as a joiner.
